Reference Contains GameEngine and helper classes for building a game. GameEngine Bases: EventManager Glitchy Games' Game engine. The game engine is responsible for initializing pygame and handling events. It also provides a number of helper methods for common tasks such as setting the screen resolution and setting the cursor. Every Glitchy Game game inherits the GameEngine command line options, so you can add your own command line options by implementing the args() class method in your Scene class.
